com.microsoft.windowsazure.management.network

Interface ClientRootCertificateOperations

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ClientRootCertificateOperationsImpl

    public interface ClientRootCertificateOperations
    The Network Management API includes operations for managing the client root certificates for your subscription. (see http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windowsazure/jj154113.aspx for more information)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      GatewayOperationResponse create(java.lang.String networkName, ClientRootCertificateCreateParameters parameters)
      The Upload Client Root Certificate operation is used to upload a new client root certificate to Azure.
      java.util.concurrent.Future<GatewayOperationResponse> createAsync(java.lang.String networkName, ClientRootCertificateCreateParameters parameters)
      The Upload Client Root Certificate operation is used to upload a new client root certificate to Azure.
      GatewayOperationResponse delete(java.lang.String networkName, java.lang.String certificateThumbprint)
      The Delete Client Root Certificate operation deletes a previously uploaded client root certificate from Azure.
      java.util.concurrent.Future<GatewayOperationResponse> deleteAsync(java.lang.String networkName, java.lang.String certificateThumbprint)
      The Delete Client Root Certificate operation deletes a previously uploaded client root certificate from Azure.
      ClientRootCertificateGetResponse get(java.lang.String networkName, java.lang.String certificateThumbprint)
      The Get Client Root Certificate operation returns the public portion of a previously uploaded client root certificate in a base-64-encoded format from Azure.
      java.util.concurrent.Future<ClientRootCertificateGetResponse> getAsync(java.lang.String networkName, java.lang.String certificateThumbprint)
      The Get Client Root Certificate operation returns the public portion of a previously uploaded client root certificate in a base-64-encoded format from Azure.
      ClientRootCertificateListResponse list(java.lang.String networkName)
      The List Client Root Certificates operation returns a list of all the client root certificates that are associated with the specified virtual network in Azure.
      java.util.concurrent.Future<ClientRootCertificateListResponse> listAsync(java.lang.String networkName)
      The List Client Root Certificates operation returns a list of all the client root certificates that are associated with the specified virtual network in Azure.

      • create

        GatewayOperationResponse create(java.lang.String networkName,
                              ClientRootCertificateCreateParameters parameters)
                                throws java.io.IOException,
                                       ServiceException,
                                       javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException,
                                       org.xml.sax.SAXException,
                                       java.lang.InterruptedException,
                                       java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException
        The Upload Client Root Certificate operation is used to upload a new client root certificate to Azure. (see http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windowsazure/dn205129.aspx for more information)
        Parameters:
        networkName - Required. The name of the virtual network for this gateway.
        parameters - Required. Parameters supplied to the Upload Client Root Certificate Virtual Network Gateway operation.
        Returns:
        A standard service response including an HTTP status code and request ID.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Signals that an I/O exception of some sort has occurred. This class is the general class of exceptions produced by failed or interrupted I/O operations.
        ServiceException - Thrown if an unexpected response is found.
        javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException - Thrown if there was a serious configuration error with the document parser.
        org.xml.sax.SAXException - Thrown if there was an error parsing the XML response.
        java.lang.InterruptedException - Thrown when a thread is waiting, sleeping, or otherwise occupied, and the thread is interrupted, either before or during the activity. Occasionally a method may wish to test whether the current thread has been interrupted, and if so, to immediately throw this exception. The following code can be used to achieve this effect:
        java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException - Thrown when attempting to retrieve the result of a task that aborted by throwing an exception. This exception can be inspected using the Throwable.getCause() method.
        ServiceException - Thrown if the server returned an error for the request.

        certificateThumbprint - Required. The X509 certificate thumbprint.

Occasionally a method may wish to test whether the current thread has been interrupted, and if so, to immediately throw this exception. The following code can be used to achieve this effect:

      • get

        ClientRootCertificateGetResponse get(java.lang.String networkName,
                                   java.lang.String certificateThumbprint)
                                     throws java.io.IOException,
                                            ServiceException,
                                            javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException,
                                            org.xml.sax.SAXException
        The Get Client Root Certificate operation returns the public portion of a previously uploaded client root certificate in a base-64-encoded format from Azure. (see http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windowsazure/dn205127.aspx for more information)
        Parameters:
        networkName - Required. The name of the virtual network for this gateway.
        certificateThumbprint - Required. The X509 certificate thumbprint.
        Returns:
        Response to the Get Client Root Certificate operation.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Signals that an I/O exception of some sort has occurred. This class is the general class of exceptions produced by failed or interrupted I/O operations.
        ServiceException - Thrown if an unexpected response is found.
        javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException - Thrown if there was a serious configuration error with the document parser.
        org.xml.sax.SAXException - Thrown if there was an error parsing the XML response.

      • getAsync

        java.util.concurrent.Future<ClientRootCertificateGetResponse> getAsync(java.lang.String networkName,
                                                                     java.lang.String certificateThumbprint)
        The Get Client Root Certificate operation returns the public portion of a previously uploaded client root certificate in a base-64-encoded format from Azure. (see http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windowsazure/dn205127.aspx for more information)
        Parameters:
        networkName - Required. The name of the virtual network for this gateway.
        certificateThumbprint - Required. The X509 certificate thumbprint.
        Returns:
        Response to the Get Client Root Certificate operation.

                                       throws java.io.IOException,

        The List Client Root Certificates operation returns a list of all the client root certificates that are associated with the specified virtual network in Azure. (see http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windowsazure/dn205130.aspx for more information)
        Parameters:
        networkName - Required. The name of the virtual network for this gateway.
        Returns:
        The response for the List Client Root Certificates operation.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Signals that an I/O exception of some sort has occurred. This class is the general class of exceptions produced by failed or interrupted I/O operations.
        ServiceException - Thrown if an unexpected response is found.
        javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException - Thrown if there was a serious configuration error with the document parser.
        org.xml.sax.SAXException - Thrown if there was an error parsing the XML response.

        The List Client Root Certificates operation returns a list of all the client root certificates that are associated with the specified virtual network in Azure. (see http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windowsazure/dn205130.aspx for more information)
